title: IGMP SYSTEM CDR TYPE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description: This command allows the operator to configure the IGMP system Call Detail Record
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with igmp privileges, and executed by 
operators with igmp privileges.
syntax: > configure mcast-control system cdr-type [ [ no ] periodic ] [ no period | peri od <Igmp::IntermGenCDRPeriod> ] [ [ no ] attempt-max-pview ] [ [ no ] attempt-blackout ] [ [ no ] attempt-no-perm ]

command_parameters.name: [no] periodic
command_parameters.description: interim CDR records generated for fullview/preview optional parameter

command_parameters.name: [no] period
command_parameters.description: intermediate CDR generation period optional parameter with default value: 15 - intermediate CDR generation period, in multiples of 5 - unit: min - range: [15...60]

command_parameters.name: [no] attempt-max-pview
command_parameters.description: CDR generated when max nbr preview exceeded is true optional parameter

command_parameters.name: [no] attempt-blackout
command_parameters.description: CDR generated allowed when blackout period is active optional parameter

command_parameters.name: [no] attempt-no-perm
command_parameters.description: CDR generated to join a mcast with no access rights optional parameter

raw:
help configure mcast-control system cdr-type
IGMP SYSTEM CDR TYPE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==========================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to configure the IGMP system Call Detail Record


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with igmp privileges, and executed by 
operators with igmp privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure mcast-control system cdr-type [ [ no ] periodic ] [ no period | peri
od <Igmp::IntermGenCDRPeriod> ] [ [ no ] attempt-max-pview ] [ [ no ] 
attempt-blackout ] [ [ no ] attempt-no-perm ]

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "IGMP System CDR Type Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] periodic              interim CDR records generated for fullview/preview
                           optional parameter

                           Parameter type: boolean
                           

[no] period                intermediate CDR generation period
                           optional parameter with default value: 15

                           Parameter type: <Igmp::IntermGenCDRPeriod>
                           Format:
                           - intermediate CDR generation period, in multiples 
of 5
                           - unit: min
                           - range: [15...60]

[no] attempt-max-pview     CDR generated when max nbr preview exceeded is true
                           optional parameter

                           Parameter type: boolean
                           

[no] attempt-blackout      CDR generated allowed when blackout period is active
                           optional parameter

                           Parameter type: boolean
                           

[no] attempt-no-perm       CDR generated to join a mcast with no access rights
                           optional parameter

                           Parameter type: boolean
                           


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
